nodes.text: The DS-9 Starforged sniper rifle was a model of blaster sniper rifle available during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. It was a similar model to the DS-8 Starforged sniper rifle.
The DS-9 Starforged sniper rifle was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Acolyte's Shadow Pack.
